seniority_level.evidence: Title is 'Data Engineer-Business Intelligence' without 'Senior' designation, but requires 3+ years experience which typically maps to mid-level in IC hierarchy

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Engineer-Business Intelligence' with focus on BI/DW projects, reporting, and visualization

sub_specialty.evidence: Focus on BI/DW projects, reporting, visualization using Cognos, and ETL tools (DataStage, Azure Data Factory, Informatica PowerCenter) indicates batch processing and data warehouse focus

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of team leadership, mentoring, managing people, or senior responsibilities. Pure individual contributor focus on technical execution

primary_cloud.evidence: Multiple clouds mentioned (AWS, Google Cloud Platform, Azure) with no clear primary cloud specified, indicating multi-cloud approach

secondary_clouds.evidence: All three major cloud providers (AWS, Google Cloud Platform, Azure) mentioned as nice-to-have skills

processing_paradigm.evidence: Focus on BI/DW projects, reporting, visualization, and ETL tools suggests batch processing rather than streaming or real-time

orchestrator_category.evidence: No specific orchestration platform mentioned - ETL tools like DataStage and Azure Data Factory could be orchestrators but no clear category identified

storage_layer.evidence: Focus on BI/DW projects and Cognos (a BI tool) suggests data warehouse storage layer rather than data lake patterns

remote_restriction.evidence: Location specified as 'Pune, Maharashtra, India' with onsite work model indicates requirement to be in India

timezone_focus.evidence: Location in Pune, India suggests India Standard Time (IST) timezone focus

relocation_required.evidence: Onsite position in Pune with no mention of remote work suggests relocation to Pune area may be required

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned and role is based in India, suggesting no H1B sponsorship available for US positions

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of student visa support (OPT/CPT) and work authorization requirements suggest focus on permanent work authorization

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship requirement mentioned, only work authorization in India implied for the Pune-based position

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Employment type stated as 'full_time' and contract type as 'permanent' indicates traditional W2 employment relationship

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits mentioned in the job posting extraction, indicating benefits were not discussed

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No mention of career growth, advancement opportunities, or development paths in the job description

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mention of mentorship programs, working with senior staff, or collaborative learning environment

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No mention of promotion opportunities, advancement, or career progression paths

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, role changes, or mobility opportunities within IBM

career_tracks_available.evidence: No mention of career tracks, IC path, management path, or specialist tracks available

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between must-have skills (Cognos, UNIX, BI/DW) and nice-to-have skills (cloud platforms, Agile) with balanced requirements

scope_definition.evidence: Focused job description specifically for Data Engineer-Business Intelligence role with clear responsibilities around BI/DW, reporting, and visualization

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: 3 years experience requirement is reasonable for mid-level data engineer role with appropriate skill set (Cognos, ETL tools, BI/DW)
